title: Chicken and potato curry
ingredients: ['1 chicken, about 1.35 kg (3 lb), jointed into 8 pieces', '1/2 tsp turmeric', '4 cm (1 1/2 in) piece fresh root ginger, peeled and finely chopped', 'juice of 1/2 lemon', '2 tbsp sunflower oil', '1 dried red chilli, broken into 2–3 pieces', '1 tsp brown or black mustard seeds', '½ tsp fennel seeds', '¼ tsp cumin seeds', '¼ tsp ground cumin', '¼ tsp ground cinnamon', '1 tbsp chickpea flour (gram flour)', '3 garlic cloves, roughly crushed', '½ green pepper, thinly sliced', '1 large onion, sliced', '1 can chopped tomatoes, about 400 g', '250 g (9 oz) potatoes, peeled', '¼ green cabbage, about 140 g (5 oz), thinly sliced', '140 g (5 oz) frozen peas, thawed with boiling water and drained', 'salt and pepper']
